info.title: Traffic Court Online Citizen Api
info.description: An API for creating violation ticket disputes

get.summary:
Gets autocomplete results
Find addresses matching the search term.

Gets autocomplete retrieve result
Returns the full address details based on the Id.
Returns a list of Violation Ticket Statutes filtered by given section text (if provided).

parameters.name: section
parameters.description: Motor vehicle act Section text to query by, ie "13(1)(a)" returns "Motor Vehicle or Trailer without Licence" contravention, or blank for no filter.

get.summary: Searches for a violation ticket that exists on file.

parameters.name: ticketNumber
parameters.description: The violation ticket number. Must start with two upper case letters and end with eight digits.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The time the violation ticket number was issued. Must be formatted a valid 24-hour clock, HH:MM.

404.description: The violation ticket was not found.

500.description: There was a server error that prevented the search from completing successfully.

400.description: The request was not well formed. Check the parameters.

post.summary: Analyses a Traffic Violation Ticket, extracting all hand-written text to a consumable JSON object.

200.description: The file appears to be a valid Violation Ticket. JSON data is extracted.

400.description:
The uploaded file is too large or the Violation Ticket does not appear to be valid. Either 
            the ticket title could not be found, the ticket number is invalid, the violation date is invalid or more than 
            30 days ago, or MVA is not selected or not the only ACT selected.

get.summary: This API is depricated. Use /api/tickets/search instead.

parameters.name: ticketNumber
parameters.description: The violation ticket number. Must start with two upper case letters and end with eight digits.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The time the violation ticket number was issued. Must be formatted a valid 24-hour clock, HH:MM.

validationErrors.description: A list of field-specific reasons why the field Confidence may be low

imageFilename.description: Gets or sets the saved image filename.

globalConfidence.description:
A global confidence of correctly extracting the document. This value will be low if the title of this 
Violation Ticket form is not found (or of low confidence itself) or if the main ticket number is missing or invalid.

fields.description: An enumeration of all fields in this Violation Ticket.

OcrViolationTicket.description: A model representation of the extracted OCR results.

Statute.description: A Statute is a Violation Ticket Fine Regulation as dictated by the BC Government.

ticketedAmount.description: The ticketed amount for this offence.

violationTicketNumber.description: The violation ticket number. This will match the ticket number searched for.

violationDate.description: The date the violation ticket was issued.

violationTime.description: The time of day the violation ticket was issued. This will match the time searched for.

offences.description: The list of offences on this violation ticket.

TicketSearchResult.description: Obsolete: Represents a violation ticket that is returned from search requests
